## defineKeyValueRepositoryClass() function

Create (define) a KeyValue repository class for the given entity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function defineKeyValueRepositoryClass<E extends Entity>(entityClass: typeof Entity & {
    prototype: E;
}, baseRepositoryClass?: Constructor<KeyValueRepository<E>>): KeyValueRepositoryClass<E>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entityClass | <code>typeof Entity &amp; {</code><br/><code>    prototype: E;</code><br/><code>}</code> | An entity class such as <code>Product</code>. |
|  baseRepositoryClass | <code>Constructor&lt;KeyValueRepository&lt;E&gt;&gt;</code> | Base KeyValue repository class. Defaults to <code>DefaultKeyValueRepository</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

`KeyValueRepositoryClass<E>`

## Example


```ts
const ProductKeyValueRepository = defineKeyValueRepositoryClass(Product);

```
